title: FSA Student Aid Estimator - User Data
description: User data required to execute the FSA Student Aid Estimator wizard for calculating federal student aid eligibility

state.description: Student's state of legal residence (full state name, e.g., 'Illinois')

grade_level.description: Student's grade level for the 2026-27 school year

has_dependents.description: Does the student have children or other dependents that they support?

circumstance_active_duty.description: Student is currently serving on active duty or is a veteran (conditional: only if has_dependents=no)

circumstance_orphan.description: Student was an orphan since turning 13 (conditional: only if has_dependents=no)

circumstance_foster_care.description: Student was in foster care or ward of court since turning 13 (conditional: only if has_dependents=no)

circumstance_emancipated.description: Student is/was a legally emancipated minor or in legal guardianship (conditional: only if has_dependents=no)

circumstance_homeless.description: Student is unaccompanied and homeless (conditional: only if has_dependents=no)

circumstance_none.description: None of the special circumstances apply (conditional: only if has_dependents=no)

parent_marital_status.description: Parent's marital status (auto-populated based on parents_married answer)

parent_state.description: Parent's state of legal residence (full state name, e.g., 'Illinois')

family_size.description: Total number of people in the student's family, including the student

parent_filed_taxes.description: Did the student's parent file taxes in 2024?

parent_income.description: Parent's Adjusted Gross Income in dollars (conditional: only if parent_filed_taxes=yes)

parent_assets.description: Parent's total assets in dollars - includes cash, savings, investments, real estate excluding primary home (conditional: only if parent_filed_taxes=yes)

parent_child_support.description: Annual child support received by parent in dollars (conditional: only if parent_filed_taxes=yes). Enter 0 if none received.

student_filed_taxes.description: Did the student file taxes in 2024?
